articles.title: 80% of new NBN customers opting for faster plans - ARNnet
articles.description: NBN Co has seen sustained demand for its higher speed tiers, with approximately four out of five new customers to the NBN opting for speeds of at least 50 Mbps.
articles.content:
NBN Co CEO Stephen Rue
Credit: NBN Co
